documents.content: Matan Bardugo is a Backend / Full-Stack Software Engineer based in Petah Tikva, Israel. He has 2 years of hands-on experience designing and implementing scalable microservices, API architecture, and end-to-end applications.
Contact Information: Phone: 054-910-5850, Email: matanew1@gmail.com, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/matan-bardugo-a2949b216, GitHub: https://github.com/matanew1
Technical Skills - Languages: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, SQL, NoSQL, HTML
Technical Skills - Backend Frameworks: Node.js, Nest.js, Flask, Spring Boot
Technical Skills - Frontend Frameworks: React.js, React Native, Next.js
Technical Skills - Databases: MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
Technical Skills - Cloud & Tools: Docker, Linux, Redis, Firebase, Postman, Jira, Confluence

Work Experience: Backend API Engineer at Cambium Applicable Innovation (07/2025 – Present). Designed and implemented RESTful microservices, ensuring clean architecture and secure third-party integrations. Developed API tooling with Nest.js and React (OpenAPI editors, validators, version managers) to standardize backend development. Contributed to multiple internal products with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainability.

Work Experience: Full-Stack Engineer at ASGARD Systems Ltd. (01/2025 – 07/2025). Built a real-time drone control application in React Native with live video streaming and communication. Delivered features in close collaboration with system engineers using modern UI/UX practices and CI workflows.

Work Experience: System Validation and Backend Engineer at Silicom Ltd. (12/2023 – 01/2025). Automated network validation for routers, switches, and servers using Python and Bash. Developed backend testing tools using Python libraries including Pandas and Flask.

Work Experience: QA Engineer at SVDS (06/2022 – 08/2023). Performed software quality assurance and API testing. Automated network reliability tests and database validations to improve product stability.
Education: B.Sc. in Software Engineering from Afeka Tel Aviv Academic College of Engineering. Achieved 1st Place Award for Final Project with a grade of 97.

Project: CyDog - Final Project (1st Place Award). A system for K9 units featuring real-time GPS tracking, live video streaming, voice commands, and mission management. Technologies used: Node.js, React.js, React Native, Socket.io, RF Protocol. GitHub: https://github.com/matanew1/CyDog-Final-Project

Project: ParkingPark. A real-time parking availability application using municipal open data. Technologies used: Node.js, React.js, WebSocket, MongoDB, Docker, Firebase. GitHub: https://github.com/matanew1/ParkingPark, Website: https://parking-park-ai.netlify.app

Matan Bardugo has strong hands-on background with Node.js, Nest.js, TypeScript, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Python, and real-time systems. Proven ability to deliver clean architecture, high-quality APIs, and robust cloud-ready services in fast-paced Agile environments.
Matan Bardugo specializes in microservices architecture, RESTful API design, and real-time applications using WebSocket and Socket.io technologies.
Matan has experience with CI/CD workflows, Agile methodologies, and collaborative development practices using tools like Jira and Confluence.
Matan Bardugo has worked on drone control systems, K9 unit management systems, parking availability platforms, and network validation automation tools throughout his career.
Matan Bardugo is proficient in JavaScript and TypeScript for both frontend and backend development, using them extensively with Node.js, React, and Nest.js frameworks.
Matan Bardugo has experience with Python for backend development, automation, and data processing using libraries like Pandas and Flask.
Matan Bardugo is skilled in Java programming and has worked with Spring Boot for enterprise backend development.
Matan Bardugo has expertise in SQL databases including MySQL, SQLite, and PostgreSQL for relational data management.
Matan Bardugo is experienced with NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB, for flexible document-based data storage.
Matan Bardugo uses Docker for containerization and deployment of applications, ensuring consistent environments across development and production.
Matan Bardugo has experience with Redis for caching and session management in high-performance applications.
Matan Bardugo uses Firebase for authentication, real-time databases, and cloud functions in mobile and web applications.
Matan Bardugo is proficient in Linux environments for server administration, scripting, and development workflows.
Matan Bardugo uses Postman for API testing, documentation, and collaboration during backend development.
Matan Bardugo built real-time communication features using Socket.io for live data streaming and bidirectional event-based communication.
Matan Bardugo implemented WebSocket protocols for real-time parking data updates in the ParkingPark project.
Matan Bardugo developed mobile applications using React Native, including a drone control app with live video streaming capabilities.
Matan Bardugo built web applications using React.js with modern UI/UX practices and component-based architecture.
Matan Bardugo developed backend services using Nest.js framework, creating OpenAPI editors, validators, and version managers.
Matan Bardugo has experience with Next.js for server-side rendering and building full-stack React applications.
At Cambium Applicable Innovation, Matan Bardugo focuses on designing RESTful microservices with clean architecture patterns and secure API integrations.
At Cambium Applicable Innovation, Matan Bardugo develops API tooling including OpenAPI specification editors, API validators, and API version management systems.
At ASGARD Systems, Matan Bardugo built a real-time drone control application featuring live video streaming and real-time communication systems.
At ASGARD Systems, Matan Bardugo collaborated with system engineers to deliver features using modern UI/UX practices and CI/CD workflows.
At Silicom Ltd, Matan Bardugo automated network validation processes for routers, switches, and servers using Python and Bash scripting.
At Silicom Ltd, Matan Bardugo developed backend testing tools using Python libraries including Pandas for data analysis and Flask for web services.
At SVDS, Matan Bardugo performed software quality assurance and API testing to ensure product reliability.
At SVDS, Matan Bardugo automated network reliability tests and database validations to improve overall product stability.
CyDog project features real-time GPS tracking for monitoring K9 unit locations during missions.
CyDog project includes live video streaming capabilities for remote visual monitoring of K9 units in the field.
CyDog project supports voice commands for hands-free control and communication with K9 units.
CyDog project provides mission management features for planning, executing, and tracking K9 unit operations.
CyDog project uses RF Protocol for reliable wireless communication between the application and K9 unit hardware.
ParkingPark project displays real-time parking availability information sourced from municipal open data APIs.
ParkingPark project is deployed on Netlify and accessible at https://parking-park-ai.netlify.app for public use.
ParkingPark project uses MongoDB for storing parking data and user information in a flexible document structure.
Matan Bardugo graduated from Afeka Tel Aviv Academic College of Engineering with a B.Sc. in Software Engineering.
Matan Bardugo won 1st Place Award for his final project CyDog, demonstrating excellence in software engineering and innovation.
Matan Bardugo achieved a grade of 97 on his final project, reflecting high academic performance and technical proficiency.
Matan Bardugo has 2 years of professional software engineering experience across multiple companies and roles.
Matan Bardugo's career progression: QA Engineer (2022-2023) → System Validation Engineer (2023-2025) → Full-Stack Engineer (2025) → Backend API Engineer (2025-Present).
Matan Bardugo is available for contact via email at matanew1@gmail.com for job opportunities and professional inquiries.
Matan Bardugo can be reached by phone at 054-910-5850 for urgent communications.
Matan Bardugo's LinkedIn profile is available at https://www.linkedin.com/in/matan-bardugo-a2949b216 for professional networking.
Matan Bardugo's GitHub profile at https://github.com/matanew1 showcases his open-source projects and code contributions.
Matan Bardugo is based in Petah Tikva, Israel and is available for local opportunities in the Tel Aviv metropolitan area.
Matan Bardugo excels in API design and development, with experience creating RESTful services, OpenAPI specifications, and API documentation.
Matan Bardugo has strong expertise in real-time systems, implementing live video streaming, GPS tracking, and WebSocket communications.
Matan Bardugo demonstrates strong automation skills, having automated network validation, testing processes, and CI/CD workflows.
Matan Bardugo has proven ability to work in fast-paced Agile environments, delivering high-quality software iteratively.
Matan Bardugo focuses on clean architecture principles, ensuring maintainable, scalable, and testable codebases.
Matan Bardugo has experience with third-party integrations, securely connecting applications to external APIs and services.
Matan Bardugo is skilled in both mobile development (React Native) and web development (React.js, Next.js) for cross-platform solutions.
Matan Bardugo has experience with network infrastructure, having worked with routers, switches, and servers at Silicom Ltd.
Matan Bardugo has experience in the defense/security sector, building drone control and K9 unit management systems.
Matan Bardugo has worked on smart city applications, developing real-time parking availability systems using municipal data.
Matan Bardugo has quality assurance background, performing software QA, API testing, and automated testing throughout his career.
